HomePage.banner: Plus One UI System 1.0 is now live >
HomePage.title: Plus One
HomePage.subtitle: An out-of-the-box full-stack admin scaffold
HomePage.descLine1: Built with Semi.Design, Spring Boot, and React.js
HomePage.descLine2: Get a production-ready, full-stack application up and running in 5 minutes—complete with user roles, audit logs, batch processing, PostgreSQL + Redis integration, and support for both local development and one-click Docker deployment. Clean code, comprehensive docs, fully open source—so you can focus on your business logic, not infrastructure setup.
